website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Moab Adventure Lace Waterproof retains the Moab Adventure’s heritage of providing excellent comfort and grip for hiking trips. It is equipped with various technologies that could prove to be useful for everyday wear.Moreover, the pair's style exudes a rugged yet classy demeanor that could be worn on a daily basis or even to casual business gatherings. If you are looking for a pair that can switch from outdoor activities to casual use, this shoe is an excellent choice.
pros: The majority of consumers said that the Merrell Moab Adventure Lace Waterproof provides excellent comfort
A handful of shoe users mentioned that the shoe has a moderate arch support, which one found to help with his back problem
A number of hiking enthusiasts claimed that the shoe performed great during their hikes
Some were delighted with the pair's versatile style that is not only functional for walks and hikes but also could pass as a casual business shoe
The Merrell Moab Adventure Lace Waterproof runs true to size, based on several reviews
Most buyers adored the shoe's weightless feel
A few wearers find the pair's material and craftsmanship to be of excellent quality
The Merrell Moab Adventure Lace Waterproof's outsole incorporates Vibram technology, which a number of users have found to offer excellent grip and traction
cons: Some buyers disclosed that the pair runs a too narrow
One reviewer mentioned that the shoe's upper is waterproof, but noticed that water still slips through the tongue's crevices

customer_reviews.title: Be very careful with sizing if you buy these
customer_reviews.text: All my shoes and boots are size 8 UK. They fit fine. I used the Amazon sizing guide when ordering these and it said buy a size 8. However, when they arrived I could barely get them on. They come up VERY small! They would have been unwearable so I thought about an exchange for an 8.5. Didn't think about for too long though as Amazon wanted over £25 more for the next size up! Forget it Amazon, this is mickey taking - I'll have a refund and shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: HV

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best £s I have spent this year.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! The size was spot on and I have wide feet. I put them on and it felt just like a pair of those shoes that have worn to the shape of your feet after months of use and you never want to take of. They are good for heavy rain or soaking wet long grass.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the premium price tag.
customer_reviews.text: After 8 mnths. wear the padding on the inside of the heel has completely worn away. They aren't worth the extra cost compared to other less expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: John Wood

customer_reviews.title: Get at least a 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get 1/2 size up from your usual shoe size. Otherwise they are very comfortable and time will only tell if they are as durable as my previous merrell shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: A good fit, decided on 7.5 size, half a size larger than Amazon recommended size for me. One small quibble, the laces could do with being a little longer. Very pleased with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: AEL

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable footwear I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable footwear I've ever bought. Got them for work as I walk 2 miles to and from work and am on my feet all day, sometimes for 12 hours. Very light and seem to be quite sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: Comfy walking shoes for urban and rural environments
customer_reviews.text: So far so comfy. Great grip on the soles - even on slick and uneven surfaces I find I have a good purchase and don't feel like I'm going to slip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes very comfortable .take 11 exchanged for 11.5 no problems would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant pair of shoes, and superb fast service by seller
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Merrell shoes are so, so compfy and well worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Colin_P

customer_reviews.title: As waterproof as your socks
customer_reviews.text: amazingly comfortable, and good for walking but they are not even remotely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: anthony palmer

product_meta.title: Merrell Men Moab Adventure Lace Waterproof Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description: Get all-day comfort with the same out-of-the-box fit you expect from moab. This mid delivers a lifestyle look, waterproofing, and traction you can trust.
